long_description: The Yurbuds Ironman Endure earphones will help enhance your athletic experience with a secure and comfortable behind-the-ear fit. Soft, ergonomic silicone ear loops help hold earphones securely in place. Patented twist lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keeps them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs medical-grade silicone for a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Durable, sweat-proof and water-resistant earphones deliver reliable performance in almost all conditions. Angled plug relieves strain on the wire. The Yurbuds Ironman Endure earphones are compatible with iPod(R), iPad(R), and iPhone(R).
short_description: The Yurbuds Ironman Endure earphones will help enhance your athletic experience with a secure and comfortable behind-the-ear fit.
